00042 typedef struct                      /* UDP control block type       */
00043     {  
00044     char                buffer[ UDP_SRVR_PKT_SIZE ];
00045                                     /* asynchronous I/O buffer      */
00046     ofstream            dbg_log;    /* debug log output file stream */
00047     boolean             dbg_log_enbl;
00048                                     /* debug logging enabled        */

00056     CRITICAL_SECTION    rx_crit_sec;/* receive critical section     */

00058                                     /* receive thread alive         */

00062                                     /* stop transmit thread         */

00066                                     /* stop write thread            */

00071                                     /* transmit thread alive        */

00073                                     /* write thread alive           */
